price: Mos i dëgjo mohuesit, por luftoji ata me forcë nëpërmjet këtij (Kurani).
arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدۡهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: falā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wajāhid'hum bihi jihādan kabīran
